summary:
Hruski - My First Follower
She has two akaviri katanas and ebony armor without helmet.
descriptionHtml:
Hruski - My First Follower
She has two akaviri katanas and ebony armor without helmet.
She is a relatively...weak follower, but you can make her specialize in stealth, pretty much anything you want.
[b]Keep in mind this is my first follower![/b] [b]I will hopefully improve as i make more![/b]
[b]
Installation:[/b]
Find your skyrim directory.
Inside your skyrim directory find "data"
Put my files inside data.
Activate the mod from the launcher.
Play.

[b]You can find her at the Sleeping Giant Inn, inside of riverwood.[/b]
author: Aegis 128
